Reviews.Title: Refurbished Equipment
Reviews.Author: Jose Guzman
Reviews.Content: The equipment offers no user manual or manufacturer's CD, headphones are not brought, assembly quality of the phone is bad, do not recommend buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: I hate this, it is used
Reviews.Author: sthielens
Reviews.Content: This item is used, in a few time present some different problems. it is from china, I dont like it, I prefer pay more but recive a new phone, I dont want to buy it again

Reviews.Title: Insatisfecho.
Reviews.Author: Oskar
Reviews.Content: Buy this with the safety equipment was new. for a gift, for a very important person, then told me that was scratched in the back and beaten. buy it from Bogota Colombia. I must do to require the warranty because nowhere in the article says that advertising is used, if the buyer is informed is own decision, but not to deceive people. Please await your response.BlackBerry Curve 8900 Javelin Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, GPS Navigation, Stereo Bluetooth, and MicroSD Slot--US Version with No Warranty (Black)Buy this phone in November 2011 and today February 2012 the screen is damaged completely damaged housing, the supplier said the phone was new, but is refubished ..... Please be careful when shopping with this seller .... I am very unhappy with the team, but even if it was a gift for someone special.

Reviews.Title: O.o!
Reviews.Author: GREG
Reviews.Content: the product did not come back despite supposedly was new .. if they have not published new sold as new and rebuilt and now!

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Juan NZR
Reviews.Content: I received the BlackBerry Curve 8900 Javelin Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, gps...It is a good phone.It is okay.

Reviews.Title: I received it in very good condition
Reviews.Author: Erik Urdaneta
Reviews.Content: The BlackBerry 8900 works perfectly just had to update the software, the battery has a very good performance. Although no 3G Wi-Fi is fast.

Reviews.Title: exelente vendedor
Reviews.Author: julio lizardo
Reviews.Content: exelente vendedor el producto me llego muy bien. como de esperar con uno que otro detalle pero en general a buen precio y bajo costo.. lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: armando nieres - venezuela- valencia, enero 2012
Reviews.Author: armando nieres- venezuela
Reviews.Content: me ha parecido un muy buen producto, de hecho yo soy comprador de celulares y el 3ro que compro,  se lo recomiendo para todo aquel que ande en busca de un javelin, hasta ahora no he tenido ningún problema, ni del sistema, ni las parte operativas,no como muchas personas que dicen que lo javelin salen malos, por esas partes, hasta ahora como dije no he tenido  ningún problema, espero le sirva de ayuda y recomendación, para aquel que opte por por comprar en esta tienda

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: CindyLuWho
Reviews.Content: After many hours (4 hours if we were counting) of trying to get the certificate on the phone activated we were finally able to download what we needed on this phone.  We had to have this  exact phone to pair with a device and without the certificate the phone was not good to anybody unless all they wanted to do was talk. I was very upset and contacted Amazon- they gave me the  number to Blackberry customer service.  They did offer a refund if we couldn't get the phone to work.  For the money we paid for the phone it should have come ready to work....  Very upsetting that we paid the money for a phone that didn't come as promised. It cost me another $50 to take the phone to a phone repair place to getting it working. I guess we are happy with it now but we should not have had to go through what we went through.

Reviews.Title: ITEM IS DIFFEREN TO SELLER SPECIFICATIONS
Reviews.Author: Guzman Martinez
Reviews.Content: I feel deceived. The item is not new. It was locked and the internet (e-mail) function is locked. It seems like if it was reported lost by a previous owner and blocked.

Reviews.Title: Cheap phone
Reviews.Author: Anya Solomon
Reviews.Content: very cheaply built. the ball is already giving problems.  case that comes with the phone is super tight. I am not at all pleased with this phone quality.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: RAFAEL
Reviews.Content: EQUIPO EN BUEN ESTADO DE FUNCIONAMIENTO SIMPLEMENTE GENIAL , GRACIAS UN CORDIAL SALUDOS DESDE VENEZUELA EXCELENTE EQUIPO ..... SI LO ES

Reviews.Title: but I miss sending charger and USB cable
Reviews.Author: víctor marquez
Reviews.Content: the phone works fine, but I miss sending charger and USB cable, and software is outdated cellfalto el envio del cargador

Reviews.Title: con problemas
Reviews.Author: mario
Reviews.Content: compre 2 de estos telefonos y ambos vinieron con problemas, tuve que enviarlos a reparar a una tienda especializada, muy inconforme con esto

Reviews.Title: no lo recomiendo
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: The product arrived bad, I recommend not to buy these products here because they do not guarantee their quality, was rebuilt and had no warranty, telephone hot, and burning batteries

Reviews.Title: felicitaciones
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: la tecnologia presentada por blackberry es muy eficiente, el producto entregado esta acorde a lo estipulado los felicito todo uy bien

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Giovanny Rincon F "Giovanny Rincon F"
Reviews.Content: TODO MUY BIEN 100% RECOMENDADO PUEDEN COMPRAR CON TODA CONFIANZA TODO A LLEGADO DE LA MANERA CORRECTA LO MEJOR, LO MEJOR

Reviews.Title: DIDN'T WORTH THE MONEY I SPENT ...
Reviews.Author: Fredy A. Giraldo O
Reviews.Content: I SENT AN E-MAIL TO AMAZON BEFORE BUYING THIS PRODUCT. I TOLD THEM TO MAKE SURE THAT THE PRODUCT WAS NEW. SOME GUY FROM AMAZON.COM ANSWERED SAYING THAT THERE WAS NO PROBLEM, HE SAID HE WAS GONNA MAKE SURE OF THAT, THAT THE CUSTOMERS' SATISFACTION WAS THE MOST IMPORTANT THING AND ALL THAT KIND OF CRAP, BUT EVEN THOUGHT I WROTE AMAZON BEFORE PLACING THE ORDER, THE ITEM THAT I RECEIVED WAS REFURBISHED.THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A CHRISTMAS GIFT. NOW, I'M GONNA HAVE TO SPEND MORE MONEY TO BUY A NEW PRESENT AND TRY TO SELL THE ITEM THAT I BOUGHT FROM AMAZON.COM FOR THE HALF OF THE PRICE I WASTED ON IT BECAUSE I CAN`T RETURN THE ITEM FROM COLOMBIA FOR A HIGHER COST.I ALSO TRUSTED BECAUSED IT SAYS THAT AMAZON.LCC TAKES CARE OF THE FULFILMENT OF THIS PURCHASE.I'M LEAVING THIS STRONG FEEDBACK BECAUSE I FELL I WAS CHEATED, AND WILL CONSIDER DROP OUT OF AMAZON.COM ACCOUNT AND NOT EVER BUY AGAIN FROM AMAZON.COMI MUST ALSO SAY THAT WHEN I SENT AN EMAIL TO AMAZON.COM, I WAS CLEAR WHEN I BEGGED THEM TO MAKE SURE THAT THE ITEM I'D RECEIVE WAS ALL BRAND NEW AND THEY ANSWERED SAYING "NO PROBLEM, WE WILL MAKE SURE"... PURE CRAP!!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jose Reyes
Reviews.Content: The blackberry phone 8900 javelin is a very good tool to send and recieve all the kind of pin that we need everyday

Reviews.Title: buen telefono
Reviews.Author: lisbeth marcano manzano
Reviews.Content: El tlf llegó en buenas condiciones, y funciona perfectmente en Venezuela. El unico detalle es que uno de los sellos de garantia de los tornillos de la carcasa estaba roto y eso me hace intuir que el telefono no es nuevo, sino repotenciado. Sin embargo, funciona bien hasta ahora.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: glanexys
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto recomendado.. lo recomiendo! funciona excelente y llego a tiempo, excelente envoltura y tal cual lo describio el vendedor

Reviews.Title: Muy Bueno
Reviews.Author: carolina palencia
Reviews.Content: Excelentes condicionesEntrega a tiempoExcelentes condiciones del equipoBuena funcionalidad y conexion wi fiRapidez de navegacionAmplia recomendacion

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it!
Reviews.Author: Tania López
Reviews.Content: I had spoken highly of this phone, so buy it, but it turns out the phone is remanufactured, after 6 months of use will harm me, was overheating and off only. It was not by accident that hurt, I'm very careful with my stuff, but unfortunately the phone to be remanufactured and came home with failures. Do not buy it!

Reviews.Title: malo
Reviews.Author: Maryu
Reviews.Content: hola... tuve la oportunidad de comprar dos veces este equipo y me ha salido malo, viene dañado o repotenciados este equipo, la pila completamente dañada no recomiendo este celular!

Reviews.Title: For resale
Reviews.Author: Pedro Gil A
Reviews.Content: From the technical point of view, is a pretty old model and with many limitations, but in my country still sold incredibly well, so good, I buy very cheap here and sell it to my country after expensive hahaha.

Reviews.Title: This was a Scam!
Reviews.Author: Irama Mojica
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone by Amazon from Venezuela on February 19 and I had to wait for some friend to travel to bring it to me. This week (April 24) when someone brought it to me and I went to the phone company to activate it, but They told me I could only use it to make calls but could not activate the Pin because it is already active on another phone, possibly in another country. The article wasn't new, the charger wasn't work and the phone can not function as a BlackBerry, which means I lost my money. I have many years buying through Amazon and this is the first time something like this happens to me. I'm really disappointed Mojica Irama

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Sujeiry
Reviews.Content: This ítems no work  have trouble activarle the internet I had to send estubo not fix myself in perfect condition as you said before purchase

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Lara
Reviews.Content: Hi, my english isn't the best, but I want tell that I LIKE the cellphone and my experience was good. So, I recomend buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: Muchas gracias, mis artículos llegaron en excelentes condiciones y en el tiempo estimado para la entrega, los recomiendo para futuras compras!!

Reviews.Title: this blackberry is great i love it
Reviews.Author: kesy "k"
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent i will love to buy more  for my boss if can . and pc mobile is great company to do business with they know how to take care of Customer and provide excellent customer service great people

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: akkend
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno el producto todo salio bien saludos desde venezuela feliz navidad muchas gracias lo empacaron muy bien feliz año nuevo 2012

Reviews.Title: WIREOVIA
Reviews.Author: Leslie Castro R
Reviews.Content: COMPRE TELEFONO BLACKBERRY 8900 Y LO RECIBI NUEVO CON TODOS LOS ACCESORIOS QUE ESPECIFICA EL VENDEDOR. FUNCIONA PERFECTAMENTE EN VENEZUELA CON MOVISTAR...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: jennlop25
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, vendedor responsble y puntual, muy atento y amable. lo recomiendo ampliamente excelente producto, vendedor responsble y puntual, muy atento y amable. lo recomiendo ampliamente

Reviews.Title: Gladys
Reviews.Author: Gladys
Reviews.Content: It's bad. it doesn't work. it has problems with the battery, mute, letters. You can't talk because the mute locks. It's very bad.

Reviews.Title: Phone definitely is used or refurbished.
Reviews.Author: Vnzla
Reviews.Content: Phone received apparently in good condition, take it immediately with me to Venezuela, surprise the phone keyboard gets stuck when pressed most of the keys.The battery runs out in about 1 hour.The phone looks used, bad assembly and old.Furthermore it resets every moment and has to take the battery out and reboot again.Going to resell it as used and old and buy a brand new from a different vendorDo not recommend this vendor.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-band cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
Access all your email and messaging with the sleekest, lightest, thinnest full-QWERTY keyboard BlackBerry yet featuring a high-resolution 480 x 320 pixel LCD screen
Wi-Fi connectivity for Web browsing; GPS for turn-by-turn directions using BlackBerry Maps; 3.2-megapixel digital camera; Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 16 GB
Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 356 hours (15 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 8900 Javelin Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, gps navigation-International Version with NO US Warranty (Black)
